General.Name: GreenFirst Forest Products Inc
General.Description: GreenFirst Forest Products Inc. manufactures and markets forest products in Canada, and the United States. It operates in two segments, Forest Products and Paper Products. The Forest Products segment manufactures and markets a range of spruce-pine-fir lumber, wood chips, and other by-products for use in residential and multi-family homes, light industrial and commercial facilities, and the home repair and remodel markets. The Paper Products segment manufactures and markets paper products that are used to print newspapers, advertising materials, food service bags, and other publications. The company was formerly known as Itasca Capital Ltd. and changed its name to GreenFirst Forest Products Inc. in January 2021. The company is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 401 The West Mall, Toronto, ON, Canada, M9C 5J5
